Reviews.Title: videophone
Reviews.Author: Peribe
Reviews.Content: We were hesitating for awhile before buying because it had to be compatible for our country.Everything looked fine so we bought this item.We were very pleased about the service, it arrived in time and the product looked ok, meanwhilewe have installed this item and it works excellent.Another possitive experience with Amazon. Thanks.

ProductInfo.Features:
AIPHONE P/N JKS-1ADF Hands-free Door Station with Color Video and PanTilt & Zoom
Includes JK-1MD Master, PS-1820UL Power Supply, and JK-DVF Stainless Steel Flush Mount Door Station
Important -Door Station Is FLUSH MOUNT Into Wall.  See P/N JKS-1ADV for kit with surface mount door station if that is needed instead.
Easy Two-Wire Install
Entry can be monitored without alerting visitors they are being viewed, even at night
ProductInfo.Name: Aiphone JKS-1ADF Hands Free Open Voice Color Video Set
